com.rigado.rigablue

Class RigReadRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rigado.rigablue.RigReadRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRigDataRequest

    public class RigReadRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRigDataRequest
    This class provides a Data Request implementation for request a read of a characteristics value. It is used by RigCoreBluetooth to manage synchronous data requests to the low level Bluetooth APIs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RigReadRequest(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device, android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void post(RigService service)
      This method is called to post a message to the RigService object connected to the Bluetooth device that should receive the operation.
